author: asianlego
title: Good for sidewalk vendors.
review: I got these when they came out and built mini shops and sidewalk vendors and parking lots on the sides of the plates. A useful plate, I must say! It even comes in a pair so you can expand your  roadside business or your roadways as you like.

author: hustla187
title: Who's Doesn't Like Roadplates?
review: Seriously, every Lego fan on the face of the earth should have roadplates. I don't care if you own this or have something else, you still need to have them. It helps on a Lego town if you want to make one or an add-on to a set. This is a MUST OWN for any Lego fan. Period.
